Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Perils_Covered: Flood, Cloud Burst, Fire, Explosion, Earthquake, Landslides, Terrorist Threats, Sabotage, Bomb Threat, Bomb Explosion, Disruption in Power Supply, Machinery Breakdown, Allied Perils
Occupation_of_Insured: Hydroelectric Power Generation and Civil Construction
Main_Activities: Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement) for Teesta-V Power Station.
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Letter of Acceptance for Package-6 Civil & Hydro Mechanical Works at Teesta-V Power Station, Sikkim. Contract awarded to Patel Engineering Limited for a total project cost of 2399764065 INR. Works to commence immediately. Acknowledgment by returning a signed duplicate copy is required.
